title._content: Cérémonie du "Memorial Day" au Cimetière Américain de Suresnes, le 30 Mai 1920 (LOC)

description._content: Cérémonie du "Memorial Day" au Cimetière Américain de Suresnes, le 30 Mai 1920 1920 May 30. 1 photographic print : gelatin silver ; 9.5 x 58.5 in. Title Translation: Memorial Day ceremony at the American Cemetery at Suresnes, May 30, 1920 Notes: Title transcribed from item. Photo shows military personnel on horseback around a cemetery with civilians attending ceremony. Copyright deposit, Louis Michaud, July 1, 1920. Subjects: Memorial Day. World War, 1914-1918--Cemeteries--American. Cemeteries. Memorial rites & ceremonies. France--Suresnes. Format: Panoramic photographs. Gelatin silver prints. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. No renewal found in Copyright Office. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Panoramic photographs (Library of Congress) (DLC) 93845487 More information about the Panoramic Photographs Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.pan Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pan.6a33285 Call Number: PAN US MILITARY - Army no. 7
